div.label: English
div.div: Add a one-line explanation of what this file represents

td.div: English: Flag of South Africa, used between 1982 and 1994. It is identical to the 1928 to 1982 version except that the shade of blue is brighter. It is also known as the "Oranje-Blanje-Blou".
Afrikaans: Die vlag van Suid-Afrika wat sedert 1982 tot en met 1994 in gebruik was. Die vlag staan bekend as die Oranje-Blanje-Blou.
Français : Le drapeau de l'Afrique du Sud entre 1982 et 1994, aussi appelé l'Oranje-Blanje-Blou.

tr.td:
Government of South Africa
(Vector graphics image by Denelson83)

span.span: The source code of this SVG is valid.
This flag was created with a text editor.

table.style: border:2px solid #D3D3D3; width:100%; background-color:#F8F8F8; text-align:center; direction:ltr;

tr.td: It is easy to put a border around this flag image:

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

tr.td:
This image was first published in South Africa and is in the public domain because it is an image of or from an official text of a legislative, administrative or legal nature or an official translation of such a text.
According to the Copyright Act, 1978 (as amended), § 12 (8) (a), "No copyright shall subsist in official texts of a legislative, administrative or legal nature, or in official translations of such texts."

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

i.div: This work is in the public domain because it was published in the United States between 1978 and March 1, 1989 without a copyright notice, and its copyright was not subsequently registered with the U.S. Copyright Office within 5 years. Unless its author has been dead for several years, it is copyrighted in the countries or areas that do not apply the rule of the shorter term for US works, such as Canada (50 pma), Mainland China (50 pma, not Hong Kong or Macau), Germany (70 pma), Mexico (100 pma), Switzerland (70 pma), and other countries with individual treaties. See this page for further explanation.

p.span: Deutsch | English | español | français | italiano | 日本語 | македонски | português | português do Brasil | русский | sicilianu | 中文（简体） | 中文（繁體） | +/−

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa;

tr.td: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

div.div:
Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time. (newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)
Date/TimeThumbnailDimensionsUserComment
current17:49, 6 January 2021900 × 600 (2 KB)Great Brightstar (talk | contribs)Technical improves
09:21, 10 June 2020900 × 600 (1 KB)Great Brightstar (talk | contribs)Fix three "gaskets"
11:29, 8 June 2020900 × 600 (1 KB)Great Brightstar (talk | contribs)Avoid using matrix() function
19:17, 1 February 2020900 × 600 (1 KB)Great Brightstar (talk | contribs)Patially revert the change.
15:09, 24 October 2019900 × 600 (2 KB)Great Brightstar (talk | contribs)Tweak some elements, remove unused codes
15:10, 9 October 2019900 × 600 (2 KB)Great Brightstar (talk | contribs)Minor adjust
13:34, 6 October 2019900 × 600 (2 KB)Great Brightstar (talk | contribs)Rework the St. George's Cross based on two paths from File:Flag of the United Kingdom.svg
12:00, 6 October 2019900 × 600 (3 KB)Great Brightstar (talk | contribs)Adjust the size of three small flags, for example, the Orange Free State flag retains 2:3 ratio, but the height is half of the white stripe of main flag. See South Africa - National 1928-1994 - sheet 1.pdf
17:38, 24 September 2019900 × 600 (3 KB)Great Brightstar (talk | contribs)Recalculated the green CMYK value
16:15, 24 September 2019900 × 600 (3 KB)Great Brightstar (talk | contribs)Makes green stripe wider, see South Africa - National 1928-1994 sheet 2.pdf
(newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)

div.p: View more global usage of this file.

This file contains additional information such as Exif metadata which may have been added by the digital camera, scanner, or software program used to create or digitize it. If the file has been modified from its original state, some details such as the timestamp may not fully reflect those of the original file. The timestamp is only as accurate as the clock in the camera, and it may be completely wrong.
